Example.Name: Period_Reload
Example.Description: In this example,we reload the counter of watch dog every Systick period,and print error information if Watchdog Timer Error or Watchdog Timer Underflow happens.We enable WatchDog and SYSTICK interrupt.In SysTick_Handler function,we reload the counter of wdt and toggle the LED3.In WDT_IRQHandler function,we print the error information,"WDT Underflow Happened" or "WDT Error Happened". This code segment suits for ht32f125x serial mcu.
